name: Retribution of the Faithful
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Waves of divine light crash down on every creature you choose within range. They must make a Constitution saving throw or take 5d6 radiant damage, increased by 1d6 for each turn you spent casting this spell. On a successful saving throw, creatures take half damage.

Each time you succeed on a concentration check while casting this spell, increase the damage by 2d6, to a maximum of 6d6. If you hit the maximum, damage no longer forces concentration checks and instead adds 6 AP to the spell.
empower: Damage increased to 8d6. Choose one - AP cost reduced to 3, or you gain 15 temporary hit points at the end of each of your turns while casting this spell until the start of your next turn, or creatures that damage you while casting this spell are always damaged.
